segments.text: Oh my God ! I can't find my first period American literature class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You look lost . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aren't you the guy who sat in front of me in our homeroom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Mary . I can't find my American literature class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's on the first floor by the nurse's office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot , Brad . I've got to go before the bell rings .
segments.speaker: S1
